channel.title: 317 pi
channel.description: My hp skill in my skills tab isn't updating properly. I've tried looking at a few different methods but it's still coming up as -hp or really high like 9234/99. Any idea why this might be happening or how to make it update properly? Thanks.

item.title: 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @portugalrox portugalrox
item.description:
@portugalrox wrote:

I guess I should also mention that the hp in the “hp orb” Work fine.

The id for the hp skill is: 8655/33207 if that is what you mean?

case 3: sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[3] + "", 4016); sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]) + "", 4017); sendFrame126("" + c.playerXP[3] + "", 4080); sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3])+1) + "", 4081); break;

Edit: When in combat it also goes all over usually negative numbers though.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

  1. What is the ID of this field or fields?

  2. Post the code you use to refresh the skill. Look in PlayerAssistant for a “refreshSkill” method. That is what I/we need to see.

Read full topic
